title: Dilshan Wirasekara appointed Sri Lanka’s Stock Exchange chairman
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Dilshan Wirasekara, Director and Chief Executive Officer of First Capital Holdings has been appointed Chairman of the Colombo Stock Exchange from June 24.
He succeeds Dumith Fernando, who steps down as the Chairman after completing his two-year tenure, the CSE said.
Wirasekara has been CEO of First Capital Holdings which has interests is stock broking, asset management. (Colombo/May20/2022)
